metadata.name: Sandra Jones

persona.name: Jamal Carter
persona.role: Existing customer, accounting contact for a manufacturing office
persona.goal: Resolve a billing discrepancy and find the right billing support channel
persona.context: Invoice amount changed unexpectedly; needs clarification and potential adjustment; not looking for new services

intent.name: Check Availability at a Business Address
intent.description: A new prospect wants to confirm serviceability for a specific business location before proceeding.
intent.goal: Provide the next step to verify address and schedule a callback to complete qualification.
intent.initialMessage: Can you tell me if service is available at 2450 W Main St, Suite 110?

emotion.name: Curious
emotion.description: Asks exploratory questions, requests options and comparisons, uses phrases like “what are my options?” or “can you tell me more?”

metadata.outcome: Appointment scheduled and requested additional billing/pricing details for the upcoming call.

turns.content: Can you tell me if service is available at 2450 W Main St, Suite 110?
I can look up availability for that location. Could you confirm it’s for a business and let me know your name, please?

messages: I can look up availability for that location. Could you confirm it’s for a business and let me know your name, please?

turns.content: Yes, it’s for a business location. My name is Jamal Carter.
Thanks, Jamal. I can check availability for 2450 W Main St, Suite 110. To give you exact details, let’s set up a quick call—what date, time, and timezone work for you?

messages: Thanks, Jamal. I can check availability for 2450 W Main St, Suite 110. To give you exact details, let’s set up a quick call—what date, time, and timezone work for you?

toolInput.input: Comcast Business service availability 2450 W Main St Suite 110

turns.content: I can do a quick call tomorrow at 2:00 pm Eastern. If that’s not open, next business day around the same time works too.
Great, tomorrow at 2 PM ET works. Could you share the best phone number to reach you?

messages: Great, tomorrow at 2 PM ET works. Could you share the best phone number to reach you?

turns.content: Sure, you can reach me at 832-322-1057.
Great, Jamal—you're all set for January 14, 2026, 2:00 PM ET. You'll get a text with the phone number to call about 5 minutes before your appointment. Anything else I can help with?

messages: Great, Jamal—you're all set for January 14, 2026, 2:00 PM ET. You'll get a text with the phone number to call about 5 minutes before your appointment. Anything else I can help with?

turns.content: Yes, one more thing—before the call, can you also pull together any info on how your billing works for business accounts (fees, contract terms, and how price changes are communicated)? That’s something I’m curious about as I review options.
